description.displayText: Stephanie has worked for our family for over a year now. She is EVERYTHING you would want in a caretaker. She's compassionate, skilled, responsible and always on time. Stephanie truly cares for her patients and takes pride in her work. She cares for our father who is bedridden. He can barely move, doesn't speak and requires a feeding tube for all nutrients. Stephanie knows how to handle all his very difficult situations and does so with great ease. She is a wonderful person who is truly talented in her job. We consider her part of the family. I highly recommend Stephanie.

I highly recommend Stephanie.

description.displayText: Stephine is an amazing care giver.  My dad had advanced dementia and also has mobility difficulties. She handled all of my father's needs flawlessly, with great care and professionalism. She handled difficult tasks with ease - some of which included eating, bathing, dressing, exercise, medicine and incontinence care. Most especially she became his most trusted companion. Her trustworthiness, dedication, passion and expertise were an immeasurable blessing to us. She was always available 24/7 to help accommodate my dad's needs as his dementia grew progressively worse and she was there for him right until his last breath.  I give Stephine my highest recommendation and I say with absolute conviction that any family in need of a caregiver for a loved one would be very fortunate and blessed to have her.

description.displayText: Stephanie is the most patient and caring person I have known to take care of my aunt. My aunt was cared for in a competent and respectful manner. Stephanie is a person of high integrity with competent creating skills, she is warm and devoted to her patient and apathetic to our family members.  Stephanie is very trustworthy and committed, I would highly recommend her as a person to provide the highest and most humane service to her patient.
